title: The 27 Club - The curse of the rockstars
subtitle: An overview of the famous musicians who mysteriously died at 27 years old
description:
This project provides an overview of the massive cultural phenomenon of the 27 Club and its members. 
It is quite well-known that the 27 Club includes all the popular artists who suddenly died at 27 years old, most of the time due to suicide, overdose or consequences related to the alcohol consumption or the use of drugs. As far as this project is concerned, we have provided an overview of the members of the 27 Club, but with a particular focus on musicians and singers.

dynamic_elements.text:
The cultural phenomenon of the 27 Club
A sense of unease surrounds the history of the so-called 27 Club, a group of young talented musicians, mainly rockstars, who are united by a sudden and premature death. We all know the most famous of them: Kurt Cobain, lead singer of Nirvana who committed suicide, Jim Morrison, frontman of The Doors who died of an overdose, as well as Amy Winehouse and Janis Joplin, Brian Jones and Jimi Hendrix. But there are more of them. It would therefore be interesting to look into this creepy Club, that has now turned into a cultural phenomenon.

dynamic_elements.count_query:
PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>
PREFIX wikibase: <http://wikiba.se/ontology#>

SELECT (COUNT(?member) AS ?count)
WHERE {
     ?member wdt:P463 wd:Q326461 .
}

dynamic_elements.map_points_query:
PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>
PREFIX wikibase: <http://wikiba.se/ontology#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?point ?pointLabel ?countryLabel ?lat ?long
WHERE {
?point wdt:P463 wd:Q326461 .
?point wdt:P27 ?country .
?country p:P625 ?statement .  
?statement psv:P625 ?node. ?node wikibase:geoLatitude ?lat ; wikibase:geoLongitude ?long.
SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en". } }

dynamic_elements.map_title: Place of death of the 27 Club members
dynamic_elements.map_points_query:
PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>
PREFIX wikibase: <http://wikiba.se/ontology#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?point ?pointLabel ?countryLabel ?lat ?long
WHERE {
?point wdt:P463 wd:Q326461 .
?point wdt:P20 ?country .
?country p:P625 ?statement .  
?statement psv:P625 ?node. ?node wikibase:geoLatitude ?lat ; wikibase:geoLongitude ?long.
SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en". } }

dynamic_elements.table_query:
PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>
PREFIX wikibase: <http://wikiba.se/ontology#>

SELECT DISTINCT ?Member ?MemberLabel (year(?BirthDate) as ?BirthYear) (year(?DeathDate) as ?DeathYear) ?BirthPlace ?BirthPlaceLabel ?DeathPlace ?DeathPlaceLabel ?pic 
WHERE { ?Member wdt:P463 wd:Q326461 . ?Member wdt:P569 ?BirthDate . ?Member wdt:P18 ?pic
       OPTIONAL {?Member wdt:P570 ?DeathDate.} ?Member wdt:P19 ?BirthPlace. ?Member wdt:P20 ?DeathPlace
        
       SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".} }

dynamic_elements.chart_query:
PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>
PREFIX wikibase: <http://wikiba.se/ontology#>

SELECT  ?label ?count
WHERE {
  ?singer wdt:P2031 ?count . 
  ?singer wdt:P463 wd:Q326461
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".
          ?singer rdfs:label         ?label.
      }

}

ORDER BY DESC(?count)

PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>
PREFIX wikibase: <http://wikiba.se/ontology#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?label (COUNT(?item) AS ?count)
WHERE {
     ?musician wdt:P463 wd:Q326461 . 
     
     ?musician wdt:P166 ?item . 
     SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".
          ?musician rdfs:label         ?label.
      }



}
GROUP BY ?label
ORDER BY DESC(?count)
